description: Cogram is an LLM-based productivity platform for the architecture, engineering, and construction (AEC) industry. Our product automates a growing number of AEC workflows such as meeting notes, site visits, project administration, and RFP bidding.

# Built for Those Who Build the World
## The AI Platform for Architects, Builders, and Engineers
From AI-assisted bidding and automatic meeting minutes to field reports and risk insights, Cogram keeps your projects on schedule, on budget, and out of disputes.
[Book a Demo](https://cogram.com/</try-cogram>)[▷ Watch Video](https://cogram.com/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63efaaff3b18fda1ef42fad3/67a785ae3b30b4a18abed8ba_LG_KirkseyA485%2B65grey-sm.jpg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63efaaff3b18fda1ef42fad3/66ed32c7b6645521a6d7bf3d_crgn.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63efaaff3b18fda1ef42fad3/67a7857a80074741272193f3_Bergmeyer_Black.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63efaaff3b18fda1ef42fad3/66150d9aa3d4c27b12167052_blu3-logo.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63efaaff3b18fda1ef42fad3/6525758eea2f6ed1dc642b74_kirkor.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63efaaff3b18fda1ef42fad3/66150b8c79739ed1e08a1cfd_mallol_logo.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63efaaff3b18fda1ef42fad3/66f27fffd020b5aa38b028f4_dg-logo.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63efaaff3b18fda1ef42fad3/67a785ae3b30b4a18abed8ba_LG_KirkseyA485%2B65grey-sm.jpg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63efaaff3b18fda1ef42fad3/66ed32c7b6645521a6d7bf3d_crgn.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63efaaff3b18fda1ef42fad3/67a7857a80074741272193f3_Bergmeyer_Black.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63efaaff3b18fda1ef42fad3/66150d9aa3d4c27b12167052_blu3-logo.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63efaaff3b18fda1ef42fad3/6525758eea2f6ed1dc642b74_kirkor.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63efaaff3b18fda1ef42fad3/66150b8c79739ed1e08a1cfd_mallol_logo.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63efaaff3b18fda1ef42fad3/66f27fffd020b5aa38b028f4_dg-logo.png)
From architects or designers to global construction and consulting firms—leading organizations use Cogram to streamline every project phase.
##### Explore the Platform
#### Accelerate Work, Manage Risk. From Proposal to Delivery.
##### Leading architects, engineers, and consultants use Cogram's AI to automate work at every project phase.
##### Tendering
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63efaaff3b18fda1ef42fad3/67a8f970f06313e8cb8b3f22_bridge.jpg)
### AI-assisted Project Bidding
Save time and win more projects. Cogram's AI uses your firm's portfolio and knowledge base to draft tailored RFP responses.
[Learn More](https://cogram.com/</project-bidding>)
##### Project Management
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63efaaff3b18fda1ef42fad3/6784c230c71e1da0072ce65b_charlesdeluvio-Lks7vei-eAg-unsplash%20\(1\).jpg)
### Automatic Meeting Minutes
Cogram drafts detailed minutes in virtual and in-person meetings, using your templates and custom style.
[Learn More](https://cogram.com/</notetaker>)
##### Site Reporting
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63efaaff3b18fda1ef42fad3/671176a6ad4386daea2269f7_in-person-cogram.png)
### Field Reports
Use Cogram's job site software to create professional inspection or field reports with artificial intelligence.
[Learn More](https://cogram.com/</field-reports>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63efaaff3b18fda1ef42fad3/67855280fbed5077d22e1534_ivan-bandura-0-no6ywKMPY-unsplash.jpg)
##### Featured Customer Story
#### "When it comes to construction and buildings and architecture, there are just so many complexities. Cogram really allows us to focus on the client’s perspective and then be able to recall that."
How Kirkor Architects and Planners use AI to streamline complex building projects
[Read Story](https://cogram.com/</customer/kirkor-architects-and-planners>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63efaaff3b18fda1ef42fad3/63efaaff3b18fd090742fb8a_loader.svg)
##### Integrations and Customization
#### AI, Integrated with Your Tools
##### Cogram automates repetitive work in project bidding, meeting minutes, and site reporting--so you can focus on your highest-impact tasks. To do this, Cogram integrates with the tools you use day-to-day.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63efaaff3b18fda1ef42fad3/678777ebb800277f300cdb2e_eng.jpg)
##### **Integrated with your Tools**
Cogram integrates with Microsoft Teams, Zoom, Outlook Email and Calendar, Google Meet, Mail and Calendar, and project or document management tools such as Procore or Autodesk Construction Cloud.
##### Works in your Templates
Cogram uses your firm's custom templates for reports, minutes, or proposals, so that minimal editing or copy-pasting is required.
##### **Understands your Business Knowledge**
Cogram learns from your portfolio of past projects, internal knowledge bases, and understands your business jargon.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63efaaff3b18fda1ef42fad3/678646fb2108ec74df0ff0a5_Microsoft_logo_\(2012\).svg.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63efaaff3b18fda1ef42fad3/678646d615ed40378e567969_Procore.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63efaaff3b18fda1ef42fad3/678647355bf0867d9d12156e_Google_2015_logo.svg.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63efaaff3b18fda1ef42fad3/6786481d6f592a04fca9fd14_adskk.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63efaaff3b18fda1ef42fad3/67864715855d2edc06881b84_Zoom_Communications_Logo.svg.png)
##### Security
#### Enterprise-grade security
[Learn More](https://cogram.com/</security>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63efaaff3b18fda1ef42fad3/671661612aeb936e75a5a87b_AICPA%20SOC%202%20Type%20II.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63efaaff3b18fda1ef42fad3/67166246046ddaac7c3efc62_gdpr-cogram.png)
##### **Cogram stores no audio or video recordings after meetings. Meeting transcripts and other data can be set to automatically delete after a timespan you control.**
##### **No training of AI models**
Cogram does not train artificial intelligence models on customer data.
##### **Enterprise Security**
Cogram is SOC 2 Type II certified and meets enterprise IT requirements such as SAML SSO, multi-factor authentication, role-based access controls, and at-rest (AES 256) and in-transit encryption (TLS 1.2).
##### **Dedicated Enterprise Instance or Private Cloud Deployment**
Deploy in enterprise private cloud environments on Microsoft Azure, Amazon AWS, Google Cloud, or on-premise.
##### Case Studies
#### **Success Stories from the Field**
##### [How the Brightmile Customer Success Team saves days of admin time with Cogram
> "I would say Cogram, for me, probably saves about three to four hours per week writing notes very easily. If I extrapolate that across the team, it will be days saved in terms of admin time."
Andy Gardner, Head of Customer Success & Programmes, Brightmile**Read the story**](https://cogram.com/</customer/brightmile>)
##### [How Kirkor Architects and Planners use AI to streamline complex building projects
> "When it comes to construction and buildings and architecture, there are just so many complexities. Cogram really allows us to focus on the client’s perspective and then be able to recall that."
Jeremy McMartin, Director of Digital Practice, Kirkor**Read the story**](https://cogram.com/</customer/kirkor-architects-and-planners>)
##### [How the AG Accounting CEO uses Cogram to ensure exceptional client services
> "It gives me that good feeling of not missing anything, of being on top of things - which is what we strive for."
Anelya Grant, Founder & CEO - AG Accounting & JustPaid**Read the story**](https://cogram.com/</customer/just-paid>)
##### [How a leading agency in the UK increased output and lowered overhead with Cogram
> "Cogram changed our hiring plan. What is more transformative than that?"
Tamara Sword, Founder & MD - ThoughtLDR**Read the story**](https://cogram.com/</customer/thoughtldr>)

From architects or designers to global construction and consulting firms—leading organizations use Cogram to streamline every project phase.
### Project Management
##### Beat deadlines
Automatically track action items and decisions to stay on top of key initiatives.
##### Prevent misalignment and disputes
Keep everyone on the same page and accountable. Prevent costly disputes or misunderstandings.
##### Control costs
Ensure project managers have the information they need to allocate resources efficiently.
## **Client Service**
Don't get distracted by writing minutes in meetings. Focus on understanding your client.
1.
**Track action items**
2.
**Summarise**
3.
**Create actionable follow-ups**
4.
**Sync to other tools**
## **Enterprise Efficiency**
Have fewer, smaller meetings, and ensure that meetings are accountable and have clear outcomes.
1.
**Create custom meeting summaries and insights**
2.
**Automate recaps for specific meeting types in your organization**
3.
**Track efficiency through meeting analytics**

generated_description:
Cogram is an innovative startup founded in 2021, based in Berlin, Germany, and part of the Y Combinator Batch W22. With a lean team of around 10 employees, Cogram is on a mission to integrate AI into the architecture, engineering, and construction (AEC) industry, delivering solutions that enhance productivity both online and on-site.

The core of Cogram's offering lies in its LLM-based productivity platform. This technology automates critical workflows like meeting notes, site reporting, project administrative tasks, and RFP bidding, ultimately streamlining processes for professionals in the field. Think of it as your digital assistant that knows the nuances of construction—helping teams stay on track, on budget, and out of disputes.

Cogram currently offers several key functionalities:
- **AI-assisted Project Bidding**: Uses past project data to help firms craft tailored RFP responses, thus saving time and increasing the chances of winning bids.
- **Automatic Meeting Minutes**: Generates detailed meeting notes, allowing team members to focus on discussions without getting bogged down in note-taking.
- **Field Reports**: Simplifies the creation of professional inspection reports right from the job site.
- **Project Risk Insights**: Delivers actionable insights to help teams manage risks proactively.

The platform also emphasizes integration with well-known tools like Microsoft Teams, Zoom, and Google Meet, ensuring a seamless experience within existing workflows. Furthermore, it maintains high security standards, boasting enterprise-grade certifications like SOC 2 Type II, which is vital for companies handling sensitive information.

Cogram has begun to make waves in the construction and architecture fields. Already, firms like Kirkor Architects and Brightmile have shared success stories, highlighting how Cogram has saved them significant time on administrative tasks and enhanced project accuracy through advanced AI features.

In summary, Cogram isn’t just about building software; it's about building productivity and efficiency in industries that shape our world. If you’re involved in AEC, it might just be time to integrate AI into your projects and see how Cogram can ignite a transformation in your workflow. For a closer look, visit their website at [Cogram](https://cogram.com).
